object_rendering module

object_rendering.render_corner(pos, scene, course, opacity, corner_data=PipeData(point_length=1, cost=1.15, length=88, color=<0.2, 0.2, 0.2>, radius=24, overhang_length=45))
object_rendering.create_new_scene(scene_data=SceneData(camera_fov=0.6283185307179586, camera_pos=<500, 1000, 75>, x_res=2048, y_res=1152, ambient_light=<1, 1, 1>, distant_lights=((<0.22, 0.44, 0.88>, <1, 1, 1>), (<-0.88, -0.22, -0.44>, <1, 1, 1>)), background_color=<0, 0, 0>))

returns a new vpython scene with ambient light and basic distant light.

object_rendering.render_mounting_wall(scene, rendering_grid, mounting_wall_data=MountingWallData(dim=<1000, 2000, 150>, mount_color=<0.8, 0.8, 0.8>, mount_spot_color=<0, 0, 0>, mount_spot_radius=10))

Renders a basic mounting wall.

object_rendering.render_obstacle(scene, pos, obstacle_data=ObstacleData(dim=<105, 105, 50>, color=<1, 0.6, 0>))

Renders an obstacle object.

object_rendering.render_pipe(scene, pos, direction, opacity, pipe_data=PipeData(point_length=1, cost=1.15, length=88, color=<1, 0, 1>, radius=25, overhang_length=45), part_id=None)

Renders a pipe object.
